concept.philosophy: Premium dark SaaS aesthetic. Less cyberpunk, more Vercel/Linear/Raycast. Warm dark grays instead of cold void blacks. Gradient accents instead of neon glows. Frosted glass panels instead of particle backgrounds. The feeling is: expensive developer tool, not sci-fi movie. Thoughtful whitespace, editorial typography, and subtle depth through layered surfaces.
distinctive_features: Warm dark gray backgrounds (#111113) instead of cold void black
Gradient mesh hero background (subtle aurora, not particles)
Frosted glass cards with high backdrop-blur and warm-tinted borders
Dual-tone accent system: teal primary + amber secondary warmth
Oversized typography with tight tracking for hero headings
Soft inner glow on cards instead of outer neon glow
Smooth 300ms transitions everywhere, no harsh state changes
Subtle noise texture overlay on backgrounds for depth

heading.rationale: Geist pairs perfectly with the warm dark SaaS look. Tight letter-spacing on large sizes gives premium feel.

hero_section.layout: Centered, max-w-5xl. Gradient mesh background (radial, very blurred, 50% opacity). Overline label, massive headline, subtitle, CTAs in row.

tailwind.gradient_blob_1: absolute top-0 -left-1/4 h-[500px] w-[500px] rounded-full bg-[#0d9488]
tailwind.gradient_blob_2: absolute -top-1/4 left-1/3 h-[600px] w-[600px] rounded-full bg-[#7c3aed]
tailwind.gradient_blob_3: absolute top-1/4 right-0 h-[400px] w-[400px] rounded-full bg-[#f59e0b]
tailwind.content: relative z-10 mx-auto max-w-5xl px-6 text-center
tailwind.overline: inline-flex items-center gap-2 rounded-full border border-[#27272a] bg-[#18181b]/80 px-4 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.1em] text-[#a1a1aa] backdrop-blur-sm
tailwind.title: mt-8 text-4xl font-extrabold tracking-[-0.04em] text-[#fafafa] sm:text-5xl lg:text-7xl leading-[1.05]
tailwind.title_gradient: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#14b8a6] via-[#8b5cf6] to-[#f59e0b] bg-clip-text text-transparent
tailwind.subtitle: mx-auto mt-6 max-w-xl text-lg text-[#a1a1aa] leading-relaxed
tailwind.cta_row: mt-10 flex flex-col items-center gap-4 sm:flex-row sm:justify-center
tailwind.cta_primary: inline-flex h-12 items-center rounded-xl bg-gradient-to-r from-[#14b8a6] to-[#0d9488] px-8 text-sm font-semibold text-white shadow-lg shadow-[#14b8a620] transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-[#14b8a630] hover:brightness-110
tailwind.cta_secondary: inline-flex h-12 items-center gap-2 rounded-xl border border-[#27272a] bg-[#18181b] px-6 text-sm font-mono text-[#a1a1aa] transition-all duration-300 hover:border-[#3f3f46] hover:text-[#fafafa]

stat_bar.layout: Three frosted-glass stat cards in a row instead of a single bar. Each card has overline label, large number, subtle gradient underline.

tailwind.card: rounded-xl border border-[#ffffff10] bg-[#18181b99] p-6 text-center backdrop-blur-xl
tailwind.label: text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.1em] text-[#71717a]

feature_card.layout: Frosted glass with warm tinted border. Top accent line (2px gradient). Generous padding.

tailwind.card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-[#ffffff10] bg-[#18181b99] p-8 backdrop-blur-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:border-[#ffffff1a] hover:bg-[#1f1f2399]
tailwind.icon: mb-5 inline-flex h-11 w-11 items-center justify-center rounded-xl bg-[#27272a] text-lg
tailwind.title: text-xl font-bold text-[#fafafa]
tailwind.link_row: mt-5 inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 text-sm font-medium text-[#14b8a6] opacity-0 transition-all duration-300 group-hover:opacity-100 group-hover:translate-x-1

navigation.layout: Fixed top bar with strong backdrop blur. Logo wordmark left. Centered links. Search + actions right.

tailwind.nav: fixed top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-[#27272a]/60 bg-[#111113]/70 backdrop-blur-2xl
tailwind.inner: mx-auto flex h-16 max-w-7xl items-center justify-between px-6
tailwind.link: text-sm font-medium text-[#71717a] transition-colors duration-200 hover:text-[#fafafa]

tailwind.section_label: px-5 mb-2 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.08em] text-[#71717a]
tailwind.link: flex items-center gap-2.5 px-5 py-2 text-sm text-[#a1a1aa] transition-all duration-200 hover:bg-[#27272a]/50 hover:text-[#fafafa] rounded-lg mx-2

tailwind.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-lg px-2.5 py-1 text-xs font-medium

code_block.layout: Rounded card with filename header, syntax-highlighted code. No terminal dots. Clean and editorial.

tailwind.header: flex items-center justify-between border-b border-[#27272a] px-5 py-3
tailwind.copy_btn: rounded-lg p-1.5 text-[#71717a] transition-colors hover:bg-[#27272a] hover:text-[#fafafa]

tailwind.trigger: flex h-10 w-60 items-center gap-2 rounded-xl border border-[#27272a] bg-[#18181b] px-3.5 text-sm text-[#71717a] transition-all duration-200 hover:border-[#3f3f46]
tailwind.dialog: rounded-2xl border border-[#27272a] bg-[#18181b] shadow-2xl shadow-black/40 backdrop-blur-2xl

hero_gradient_mesh.description: Three gradient blobs slowly rotate and shift position. Pure CSS animation, no JS. 20s cycle.
hero_gradient_mesh.keyframes: @keyframes mesh-drift { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(0deg) } 33% { transform: translate(30px, -20px) rotate(120deg) } 66% { transform: translate(-20px, 15px) rotate(240deg) } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) rotate(360deg) } }

section_entrance.description: Gentle fade up with 100ms stagger. Slower than Concept A — 400ms per item.

card_hover.description: 300ms all transition. Border brightens, background lightens slightly. No scale transform — just color shift.

stat_reveal.description: Numbers fade up from 10px below with 600ms duration on viewport intersection.

animations.reduced_motion: Gradient mesh becomes static. All transitions snap to final state. Content visible immediately.

hero.mobile: text-4xl, py-24, gradient mesh reduced to single blob

stat_cards.mobile: single column, horizontal layout within each card

accessibility.noise_texture: aria-hidden, purely decorative, no impact on readability
